    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sestavimo oglas</string>
            <string language="en">Put together an advertisement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt einer Reklameanzeige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté une publicité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido uma propaganda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito una pubblicità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί μια διαφήμιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juntado un anuncio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zamisli si, da delaš v oglaševalskem podjetju in moraš napisati ponudbo za drevo. Izberi drevo za predstavitev. Rad, rada bi, da bi to drevo ljudje kupovali za svoje vrtove. Poskusi biti prepričljiv, prepričljiva!</string>
            <string language="en">Put together an advertisement that will convince people to buy your tree.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">oglas</string>
            <string language="en">advertisement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">oglaševanje</string>
            <string language="en">advertising</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pisno izražanje</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ustvarjalnost</string>
            <string language="en">creativity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt einer Reklameanzeige, die Leute 
überzeugt, Ihren Baum zu kaufen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté une publicité qui convaincra des 
personnes d'acheter votre arbre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido uma propaganda que convença povos comprar 
sua árvore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito una pubblicità che convincerà la gente 
comprare il vostro albero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί μια διαφήμιση που θα πείσει τους ανθρώπους
για να αγοράσει το δέντρο σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juntado un anuncio que convencerá a gente que 
compre su árbol.</string>
          </description>
